name: 郭霽慶
objective: This course mainly focuses on explaining the basic concepts and common sense related to polymer materials (for example: the structure of polymers, the formation of structures, molecular motion, etc.), and the molecular structure of polymers will determine its chemical/physical properties. It will determine its use and processing methods. On the application side, the current novel optoelectronic polymers and biomedical polymers will be introduced. It is expected to have a general understanding of polymer materials and their current applications, and to generate interest in polymer materials.
schedule:
Introduction to polymer science
Concept of organic chemistry for polymer science
Physico-Chemical properties of polymer – 1
Physico-Chemical properties of polymer– 2 
Synthesis of polymer – Step-growth polymerization - Generalities
Synthesis of polymer – Step-growth polymerization - Polycondensation
Synthesis of polymer – Step-growth polymerization – Polyaddition
Synthesis of polymer – Chain Polymerization – Generalities
Midterm exam
Synthesis of polymer – Chain Polymerization – Radical polymerization
Synthesis of polymer – Chain Polymerization – Cationic polymerization
Synthesis of polymer – Chain Polymerization - Anionic polymerization
Characterization of polymer
Application of polymer 
Going further: block copolymer (BCP), self-healing polymer, composite introduction
Characterization of BCP and their applications
Final examination
Oral exams
